name: App Granted Microsoft Permissions
description: Detects when an application is granted delegated or app role permissions for Microsoft Graph, Exchange, Sharepoint, or Azure AD
author: Bailey Bercik '@baileybercik', Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow'

detection.query: selection: {"properties.message": ["Add delegated permission grant", "Add app role assignment to service principal"]}

falsepositives: When the permission is legitimately needed for the app
